
# `r var_zonation`

```{r echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, results='asis'}
output_zonation <- NULL
metric_item <- list()
output_metric <- list()
formula <- list("")
metric_list <- zonation_metric %>%
  filter(.data$zonation == var_zonation)
for (var_metric in metric_list$metric_name) {
  level <- 2
  metric_item[[level]] <- metric_list %>%
    filter(.data$metric_name == var_metric)
  output_zonation <- c(output_zonation, knit_child("fiche_metric.Rmd"))
}
```
